lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry was expected back on the court for more light shooting Monday to test his sprained right knee, still with the hope he could be ready to return for Golden State's Game 3 of the Western Conference semifinals Saturday at Portland.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Still Hopeful to Have Stephen Curry Back for Game 3
headline.main: Warriors Still Hopeful to Have Stephen Curry Back for Game 3
